nodes.text: Honey was a gold-colored substance that was secreted by some creatures, such as the Vashkan apidactyls. At least some types of honey were fit to be eaten. On the planet of Crucival, the high-ranking members of the Opaline Creed consumed honey alongside meat and wine. On Akiva, there existed a liquor that tasted like honey on the front, and lavender at the finish.
